meanings.definition: A small hot-tasting pod of a variety of capsicum, used in cooking.
meanings.sent1: I added some chilis to the soup for extra flavor.
meanings.sent2: The recipe calls for chilis to give the dish a spicy kick.
meanings.sent3: The chilis in the stew were feeling quite hot and bothered.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like chilis, leaving a fiery trail in their wake.
meanings.sent5: The chilis danced on my taste buds, awakening my senses.

meanings.definition: A hot-tasting powder made from dried and ground chili peppers.
meanings.sent1: Sprinkling some chilis on top of the dish added a burst of heat.
meanings.sent2: The chef used chilis to season the sauce and make it spicy.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat sneezed after sniffing the open jar of chilis.
meanings.sent4: His words were like chilis, spicing up the conversation.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the chilis filled the kitchen, making my mouth water.
